Nisitrus marginatus
–
Otte 1994: 67
(name reinstated). —
Cigliano et al. 2020
( Orthoptera species File Online).

INDONESIA –
Sumatra
• 1 ♀ ; Stamford Raffles leg.; NHMUK 012497570
.

It is unclear why Otte (1994) reinstated
N. marginatus
as a valid species, even though earlier literature had already synonymised this species under
N. vittatus
. Based on the observation of a female syntype showing no difference with
N. vittatus
, we synonymise
N. marginatus
again under
N. vittatus
.
